description: Their Women’s Sweet Trip Graphic Short Sleeve Tee is made with a blend of durable, quick-drying polyester and performance-ready Merino for moisture management, temperature regulation, and odor resistance. Plus, it has offset shoulder and side seams to keep this style comfortable, as well as a body-skimming fit that moves with you. So no matter where you’re headed, it’s a good trip guaranteed.<br>
name: Sweet Trip Graphic SS Tee - Womens

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 44% Recycled Polyester. Exclusive of Decoration
